### About Me

Hi, I am a Data Science and Biostatistics Master's student in Columbia University, graduating in October 2022.
My journey to data science started from being heavily involved with computational neuroscience research
in undergraduate and post-graduate, where I was able to really confirm my passion for analyzing data 
and turning them into meaningful insights.
This led me to my current graduate program, where I have learned about data science and statistics in depth and have gained robust hands-on work experience through projects and internships.
Please check out some of my **data science projects** in the 'Projects' tab!
